annotations.description: This one was requested some time ago and I finally got around to shooting it for you guys. This is one of the more obscure Modern Classic Cocktails created b...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Eeyore's Requiem

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Campari
1oz (30ml) Dolin Blanc Vermouth
.5oz (15ml) London Dry Gin
.25oz (7.5ml) Cynar
.25Oz (7.5ml) Fernet Branca
15 drops Orange Bitters
3 Orange Twists and Discard

Stir and strain into cocktail glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D-Q7J-YOrbE
title: Eeyore's Requiem
